actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Navy to construct and provide shoreside facilities for the education and convenience of visitors to the United States Ship Arizona Memorial at Peal Harbor and to transfer responsibility for their operation and maintenance to the National Park Service.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Navy to construct and provide shoreside facilities for the education and convenience of visitors to the United States Ship Arizona Memorial at Pearl Harbor, and to transfer responsibility for their operation and maintenance to the National Park Service. Authorizes to be appropriated $2,500,000 for the planning, construction, equipping, and furnishing of such facilities, such sum to be in addition to the regular budgetary appropriations for the Department of the Navy.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Navy to construct and provide shoreside facilities for the education and convenience of visitors to the United States Ship Arizona Memorial at Peal Harbor and to transfer responsibility for their operation and maintenance to the National Park Service.
